title: Macron says France in talks with Taliban over further Afghan evacuations
content:
1. Macron says France in talks with Taliban over further Afghan evacuations  Reuters
  2. Intense negotiations continue over future of Kabul airport after US forces leave • FRANCE 24  FRANCE 24 English
  3. France held talks with Taliban to facilitate evacuations - foreign ministry  Yahoo News
  4. France says its evacuation operation from Kabul is finished  Reuters
  5. UK, France end Afghan evacuation efforts, but many who wish to flee left behind  The Times of Israel
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Macron says France in talks with Taliban over further Afghan evacuations  Reuters
Intense negotiations continue over future of Kabul airport after US forces leave • FRANCE 24  FRANCE 24 English
France held talks with Taliban to facilitate evacuations - foreign ministry  Yahoo News
France says its evacuation operation from Kabul is finished  Reuters
UK, France end Afghan evacuation efforts, but many who wish to flee left behind  The Times of Israel
